ideas.name: Personal Finance Tracker
ideas.description: A personal expense tracking app with CSV bank import, custom categories, automatic transaction categorization, and tax report generation for side business expenses.
motivations: Spending too much time reconciling bank statements with budget spreadsheet
Want to track spending patterns and generate tax reports
ideas.evolution: Started vague, became more detailed with specific features like CSV import and business expense separation

ideas.name: Semantic Bookmark Manager
ideas.description: Browser extension with AI-powered auto-tagging, dead link detection, and semantic search using embeddings to find bookmarks by meaning rather than keywords.
motivations: Have thousands of disorganized bookmarks, can never find things
Bookmarks are a mess across multiple browsers
ideas.evolution: Consistent vision across mentions, focused on search and discovery

ideas.name: ProjectPod Context Switcher
ideas.description: CLI tool that captures and restores full project context including terminal state, editor files, environment variables, and browser tabs.
motivations: Lose too much time switching between projects, resetting environment

ideas.name: Dotfiles Manager
ideas.description: Simple tool to track and sync dotfiles (.zshrc, nvim config, etc.) to a git repo. Planned as a Rust learning project.
motivations: Learning Rust and want to track config files
Got stuck on edge cases before, want to restart simpler
ideas.evolution: Scope narrowed from comprehensive to MVP focused on personal use
